name: 丁原智
objective:
一、地質資料之收集分析與應用
二、大地應力分析量測方法。
三、地下坑室設計。
四、地下坑室施工。
五、監測與管理。
schedule:
第1週　　　　Introduction - Type of tunneling and history of tunneling excavation
第2週　　Geotechnical aspect - Review of geotechnical considerations and investigations
第3週　　Rock mass classification - Rock mass classification system and affect of ground control (1)
第4週　　Rock mass classification - Rock mass classification system and affect of ground control (2)
第5週　　Ground control method - Temporary control and support (rock bolting, cable bolting, steel sets and roof trusses)
第6週　　Conventional drill and blast tunnels - Full face methods, multiple face methods
第7週　　　　Review of mechanical excavation - Review of mechanical excavation tools
第8週　　Review of mechanical excavation - Review of specific energy concepts, Review of mechanical excavation machines
第9週　　　　mid-term test
第10週　　Tunnel boring machines/rock machines(1) - Nomenclature, cuter head shape, cutter replacement, cutter head drives
第11週　　Tunnel boring machines(2) - Soft ground slurry machines and earth pressure balance machines
第12週　　Tunnel boring machines(3) - Roadheaders for tunnel and underground excavation
第13週　　Larger chamber excavation - Construction of large chamber and cavern (crushing and skip loading station, power house, etc)
第14週　　Shaft sinking - Shaft developed for tunnel construction in soft ground
第15週　　Tunnel application (1) - Tunnel applications and requirements for civil, highway, railroad, power and etc.
第16週　　Tunnel application (2) - Tunnel applications and requirements for mining development
第17週　　Cost estimation - Manning and cost estimating for tunneling and underground construction
第18週　　final test
scorePolicy:
期中考:40%
期末考:40%
平時成綪:20%
